text: And whoever surrenders his purpose to God and does good (muḥsin)�He said:[That is,] whoever purifies (akhlaṣa) his religion for God, Mighty and Majestic is He, and accomplishes well the propriety (adab) of sincerity (ikhlāṣ) [has certainly grasped] the firmest handhold, this being the Sunna.His words:
